Package ch.zh.transferclient.processing

Provides classes for the main functionalities of the Transfer-Client.
  • Moving the result files to the stage folder.
  • Creating sedex envelope files.
  • Moving the result files and envelopes.
  • Processing the receipt files.
Version:
2.4
Author:
Daniel Bierer (Statistisches Amt des Kantons ZÃ¼rich)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Processing
    This class is used to process the input and receipt files.
    Processing_Receipts
    This class is used to process the receipts: The receipt files are evaluated in order to inform the end user about the transfer status.
    Processing_Receipts_ExtractElement_NOT_ANYMORE_USED
    This class is used to extract parameter values from an envelope file.
    Processing_Receipts_ExtractElements
    This class is used to extract parameter values from an envelope file.
    Processing_Receipts_ExtractElements_OLD
    This class is used to extract parameter values from an envelope file.
    Processing_Receipts_ExtractElements_OLD2
    This class is used to extract parameter values from an envelope file.
    Processing_Receipts_GUIUpdate
    This class is used to update the STATUS INFO within the GUI tables.
    Processing_Receipts_OLD
    This class is used to process the receipts: The receipt files are evaluated in order to inform the end user about the transfer status.
    Processing_Receipts_OLD2
    This class is used to process the receipts: The receipt files are evaluated in order to inform the end user about the transfer status.
    Processing_Receipts_Record
    This class is used to construct receipts.
    Processing_SingleInput
    This class is used to process a single input file.
    Processing_SingleInput_CreateEnvelope
    This class is used to create envelope files.
    Processing_SingleInput_GUIUpdate
    This class is used to update the GUI after an input file has been processed.
